WorkItem.Description:
Accordion VerticalAlignment="Stretch" Does not respond to window state changes such as maximise and restore. 
Although HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" does.
Â 
 <my1:Accordion HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" VerticalAlignment="Stretch">
            <my1:AccordionItem>
                <TextBlock Text="Hello1"/>
            </my1:AccordionItem>
            <my1:AccordionItem>
                <TextBlock Text="Hello 2"/>
            </my1:AccordionItem>
</my1:Accordion>
WorkItem.Summary: Accordion VerticalAlignment="Stretch" Does not respond to window state changes
